reviews.review: There's no connection between player and the game. If i report someone for greifing it will never go through, if you report a cheater it will never go through, the struggles of playing this game with all the glitches in the system is bad. If i enter a match alone and i get into a game with 4 people in a queue, they usually kick the odd person in the 5 man team (me). Getting kicked constantly in a comp game gets you a ban and you then have to wait to play again, its frustrating. This game went from a gem to a game full of babies. I put so many hours in and its sad to see that i barely play it anymore.
